description.value:
You use your charge mainly to frighten your enemies rather than to attack them directly.

Prerequisites: Str 13, Intimidate 1 rank, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.jJsNgmbzRct9mE65]{ferocious charge} universal creature rule

Benefit: When you charge as a full action, you can attempt an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i]{Intimidate} check to demoralize a creature within your melee reach at the end of the charge, rather than making a melee attack. If you succeed at your Intimidate check, the target is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{shaken} for 1 additional round and you gain a +1 morale bonus to attack rolls to resolve combat maneuvers against the target until the end of your next turn.

Special: If you have an ability that allows you to charge without taking penalties to your attack roll or AC (such as the charge attack ability from the soldierâ€™s @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.AKI0TQ3pSwmU5twg]{blitz} fighting style), you qualify for this feat as though you had the ferocious charge ability.

modifiers.name: Startling Charge
modifiers.notes: If you succeed at your Intimidate check, the target is shaken for 1 additional round and you gain a +1 morale bonus to attack rolls to resolve combat maneuvers against the target until the end of your next turn.
